rationale: 'mass mortality events' uses a modifier on a noun phrase. 'largest ecological disasters' uses a comparative on a noun phrase.
statement_text: "If the virus does start to cause mass mortality events across penguin colonies, it could signal one of the largest ecological disasters of modern times," researchers wrote in a pre-print research paper last month.

rationale: The phrases 'mass mortality events' and 'one of the largest ecological disasters of modern times' are Alarmist cues.
statement_text: "If the virus does start to cause mass mortality events across penguin colonies, it could signal one of the largest ecological disasters of modern times," researchers wrote in a pre-print research paper last month.
